txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
Stole a mushroom ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Year 6 Tales: Pippin
Gaze into the Orthanc-stone on the eastern foot of Dol Baran
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
They were quite hungry now, and made as good a meal under the open sky as anyone could wish.

Enjoy a meal at the Prancing Pony

<rgb=#FF00FF>Faint</rgb> at the top of one of the Slag Hills
The troll toppled forward. Blackness and crushing pain came, and Pippin's mind fell away into darkness.
Encouraged by his success at the story of the fat Mayor of Michel Delving, Pippin began giving an account of Bilbo's farewell party.
'Yes, you are all safe for the present,' said Gandalf. 'Soon there will be feasting and merrymaking...'

Gather remembrances in the Great Smials ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
